name: tsapp
description: - https://www.miai.vn/2019/08/22/ocr-nhan-dang-van-ban-tieng-viet-voi-tesseract-ocr/  - Or download file zip from there and unzip its (use in Windows) to project: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ah6r-eqm8WDOnjSv_y5o3yYylGSbOZMl/view?usp=sharing

scripts.build: pyinstaller tsapp.py && cp -r themes dist/tsapp && cp -r asset dist/tsapp && cd dist/tsapp && mkdir temp && mkdir data && cd data && touch global.txt
